name: Hover Skirt: stack & dress up
description:
Check out this new amazing 3D game!

You're a girl stacking her skirt and hovering over the abyss on this long dress made of colorful stripes. Looks stylish!

And how does she fly? Is it voodoo magic or is she Marry Poppins? Maybe it's just ballerina's dance pas and jumps? Only you decide!

When you walk on the ground, which is more like a catwalk podium, your model picks up not only skirts and dresses, but also high heels, fashion clothes and hair (or better say wig) - race against time is a challenge!

What gate would you choose - angel or demon? Choose your destiny in this eternal fashion battle and dress up like an angel or devil!

Try Hover Skirt now, create your best stylish dress and fly in the sky!
